Using the Iometer GUI
The Iometer user interface is made up of the following major componants.
Toolbar:
Performs common operations such as starting and stopping tests.
Status bar:
Shows which test in a test series is currently running.
Topology panel:
Displays the available managers (Dynamos) and workers (threads). Actions in the toolbar, Disk Targets, Network Targets, and Access Specifications tabs apply to the manager(s) or worker(s) selected in this panel, and this panel is used to select managers and workers for the Results Display tab.
Tabbed panels:
Several different tabs to control the parameters of the test:
Disk Targets tab:
Specifies the disks used by each disk worker.
Network Targets tab:
Specifies the network interfaces used by each network worker.
Access Specifications tab:
Specifies the type of I/O operations each worker performs to its targets.
Results Display tab:
Displays performance data during the test.
Test Setup tab:
Specifies the tests to be performed in a test series.
